definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: acquire (cf. Ar. h.arafa turn a thing from its proper way or manner, but also gain, acquire [subsistence] for one's family)—only

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. f. [[שִׁפְחָה נֶחֱרֶפֶת לְאִישׁ]] a maidservant acquired for a man (viz. as his concubine) Le 19:26 (H; cf. NH [[חֲרוּפָה]] of woman designated for a man).
